alert.note: Alert for Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:32PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lake and northwestern Cook Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 832 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hoffman Estates, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arlington Heights, Schaumburg, Palatine, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Buffalo Grove, Wheeling, Elk Grove Village, Vernon Hills, Lake Zurich, Barrington, Rolling Meadows, Roselle, Prospect Heights, Long Grove, Hawthorn Woods, Inverness, Lincolnshire and Barrington Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Illinois.
